Scene:
Disinheritance of Genda
(Genta kandō / 源太勘当)

Play: The Battles of Genji and Heike (ひらかな盛衰記)

Production: July 1977 Asahiza

– Click image to view.



Narrators (Tayu):

Takemoto Oritayū V (see also Takemoto Tsunatayū IX) (竹本織大夫 (五))



Shamisen Players:

Tsuruzawa Enza V (鶴澤燕三 (五))
